00011 #ifndef BOOST_NONCOPYABLE_HPP_INCLUDED
00012 #define BOOST_NONCOPYABLE_HPP_INCLUDED
00013 
00014 namespace boost {
00015 
00016 //  Private copy constructor and copy assignment ensure classes derived from
00017 //  class noncopyable cannot be copied.
00018 
00019 //  Contributed by Dave Abrahams
00020 
00021 class noncopyable
00022 {
00023  protected:
00024     noncopyable() {}
00025     ~noncopyable() {}
00026  private:  // emphasize the following members are private
00027     noncopyable( const noncopyable& );
00028     const noncopyable& operator=( const noncopyable& );
00029 };
00030 
00031 } // namespace boost
00032 
00033 #endif  // BOOST_NONCOPYABLE_HPP_INCLUDED
